column5: I am looking for recommendations and contact info for an independent walleye guide in the Sioux Lookout area. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Dennis Anderson guides Minnitaki, Abram and Pelican and lac seul but knows the whole area, a great guy. He lives on Abram and I have fished with him the last 5 years. If you are interested I will give you his number, let me know. don bernardi
You might try Colin Gosse. He's a regular on here and consistently produces big fish.http://www.lacseulguide.com/
I would suggest Ben Beattie. He posts on here on occasion, is a guide from Sioux Lookout, has had several magazine articles published and is a nice guy. PM me and I can give you contact info.
I suggest Smokey Cole. He has done a great job for us. If you post your email address I can send you his contact info.
call James Mansfield for a great day of fishing on Minnitaki or Lac Seul .807 737 3136
His younger Brother. He could catch fish in a shot glass in a parking lot!!!!!!
Do you still have an email address for Smokey Cole? Used him on Minnitaki a few years ago, would like to use him again this summer. Thanks.
